Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Design.DataTableMappingCollectionEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

Docs.summary: A collection of objects. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example uses an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> to <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection.Add%2A><xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> objects to its <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.TableMappings%2A> collection, and then displays a list of those mapped source tables. This example assumes that an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> has already been created.
[!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

[!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.DataTableMappingCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.DataTableMappingCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.DataTableMappingCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.DataTableMappingCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example searches for a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> within the collection. If the mapping exists in the collection, it is removed. If the mapping does not exist within the collection, it is added to the collection and its index is displayed. The example assumes that a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> collection and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> object have been created.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping GetTableMappingBySchemaAction (System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection tableMappings, string sourceTable, string dataSetTable, System.Data.MissingMappingAction mappingAction);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping GetTableMappingBySchemaAction(class System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection tableMappings, string sourceTable, string dataSetTable, valuetype System.Data.MissingMappingAction mappingAction) cil managed

Docs.param: The collection to search.
The case-sensitive name of the mapped source table.
The name, which is not case-sensitive, of the mapped table.
One of the values.
Docs.summary: Gets a object with the specified source table name and table name, using the given .

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> exists in the collection, it is returned.
If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> does not exist in the collection for a given <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>, the following happens:
|MissingMappingAction|Action taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|Creates a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> object with the given `sourceTable` as the source table name and `dataSetTable` as the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> table name. The created <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> object is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|An exception is generated. The `dataSetTable` parameter is ignored.| |`Ignore`|Gets `null`. The `dataSetTable` parameter is ignored.|
## Examples The following example searches for a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> with the given source table name within the collection. If the object exists, it is returned. The example assumes that a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> collection and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> object have been created.
[!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
